results.snippet: STAMFORD, CONN.  THERE has been a notion of long standing in my mind that I can tell from a person's occupation whether or not he is likely to be  a good cook. In the "likely" category, I would include doctors, lawyers, actors, painters, musicians...
results.lead_paragraph: STAMFORD, CONN. THERE has been a notion of long standing in my mind that I can tell from a person's occupation whether or not he is likely to be a good cook. In the "likely" category, I would include doctors, lawyers, actors, painters, musicians and, stretching the point a bit, baseball players.

results.lead_paragraph: With a fleet ranging from a $314 dinghy to a sumptuous motor yacht bearing a price tag of more than half a million dollars, the fourth international in-water boat show will get underway at 10 A.M. Thursday for a four-day stand at Cove Marina in Norwalk, Conn.

results.abstract: Richard Higgins article recalls NY Mets winning World Series in '69 (S)

headline.main: Joy in Metville Gone but Not Forgotten

results.snippet: The closing image of that surrealistic season is still fresh in my mind a decade later and still hard to believe: Cleon Jones sinking down to one knee in the outfield (to play it safe or to pray, or both) as he speared the year's last line drive,...
results.lead_paragraph: The closing image of that surrealistic season is still fresh in my mind a decade later and still hard to believe: Cleon Jones sinking down to one knee in the outfield (to play it safe or to pray, or both) as he speared the year's last line drive, closing his eyes in brief disbelief as Shea Stadium exploded into tumult from field to rafter.

results.abstract: United Technologies engineer John S Lovell patents portable breathing equipment for emergency use aboard space shuttle; illus (M)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: RECORDINGS (DISK AND TAPE) AND RECORDING AND PLAYBACK EQUIPMENT

results.snippet: WASHINGTON PORTABLE breathing equipment  has been invented for emergency use aboard the space shuttle that is to be launched next year by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. With the equipment, which operates in the absence of gravity,...
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON PORTABLE breathing equipment has been invented for emergency use aboard the space shuttle that is to be launched next year by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. With the equipment, which operates in the absence of gravity, exhaled air can be breathed again after the carbon dioxide is removed by a chemical absorbent and oxygen is added.
